Posts.Title: 100 things never to say to a woman who has had a mastectomy: iwannabefree jillyG

Posts.Content: DENTHOMAS wrote: I was wondering if the feeling will ever come back in my upper arm?  I had a mastectomy on 12/18/09 with 14 nodes removed.  My arm is still numb and also my under arm area. There isn't any swelling.  My scar is still very sensitive too. Dx 11/15/2008, IDC, <1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, 1/18 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Numbness in Arm After Surgery DENTHOMAS pinkmama

Posts.Content: May 27, 2009 01:34PM DENTHOMAS wrote: Yes, it's the back side of my upper arm. It feels like it doesn't belong to me. Sometimes that area is cold.  I've been massaging it myself.  There isn't any swelling.  It just feels weird.  The doctor said the feeling may never come back.
